categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: "Lunn" was the nickname of a clone trooper during the Clone Wars. In 22 BBY, he was closely involved with Sergeant Coric at Teth. During the Battle of Teth, Lunn was killed along with most of his company.
As a male Human clone of bounty hunter Jango Fett, Lunn stood 1.83 meters tall, and was born on the Wild Space planet Kamino.
Lunn first appeared in the 2008 novelization of the Star Wars: The Clone Wars film by Karen Traviss.
